author: JamesWTruher
body: Currently, we only run Describe blocks tagged with `CI` and are not running tests tagged `Feature`, `Scenario`, or `Slow`. We really should have a way to regularly run all of our tests.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body:
Design Proposal:
- [x] 1.  Refactor the AppVeyor.yml PowerShell code into a module
- [x] 2. Refactor code which should be in build.psm1 into appVeyor.yml and the other way around
- [x] 3. Add the code to AppVeyor.yml to allow for a scheduled build
- [x] 4. ~~Create a new~~ Edit AppVeyor Project and set it up to only run on a schedule
-  ~~Add a badge for the daily build to the readme.~~

title: we need a way to run all of our tests, not just CI
